text:
Todd Starnes: President Obama Needs to Stop With the Political Correctness About Islam Published July 17, 2015 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
By Todd Starnes, Fox Nation 
What I am about to tell you is politically incorrect. The truth is that Islamic radicals live among us, waiting to wage jihad against the infidels - folks like you and me. 
We all know what went down in Chattanooga, Tennessee. It was the same thing that went down at Fort Hood and the Boston Marathon and the same thing that went down on 9/11. Americans murdered by a Muslim - on American soil. 
Four unarmed Marines gunned down in cold blood by a man named Mohammad Youssef Abdulazeez. Investigators connected the dots and labeled the attack as "domestic terrorism." 
But President Obama doesn't seem to think there are any dots to connect. He said what happened in the Scenic City was the act of a lone gunman - "a heartbreaking circumstance. " "It is a heartbreaking circumstance" — @POTUS on the shooting in Chattanooga https://t.co/sS7cQen0Qj — The White House (@WhiteHouse) July 17, 2015 
Not once did he mention the words "radical Islam." Not once did he mention "jihad" or "terrorism." 
What happened in Chattanooga was an act of war But how can we fight a war on terror when our Commander-in-Chief won't even acknowledge who the enemy is - or that we even have one?
